about_the_game:
Check out our Discord server for information on upcoming beta tests!

Wyrmacide is a thrilling, fun, and competitive 1v1 tactics game that combines strategic turn-based tactics with intense real-time action. Defeat the opposing Wyrm as you climb to the top of the Rankings.

In Wyrmicide, you'll engage in a unique dual-phase gameplay experience. You will enter the Tactical Board as you harness strategic decision-making and careful planning to place or move your units into advantageous positions. When your units encounter the enemy, the battle is a skill based 1v1 duel to the death, where the victor inches ever closer toward slaying the enemy's Wyrm.

⠀⠀⠀

⠀

Strategize...

Similar to a chess board, your units will be displayed on the Tactical Board. Players take their turns simultaneously, anticipating each other's move. Pieces have unique movement ranges and pattern. Additionally, some pieces are Quick, allowing them to slip past or ambush slower pieces.

Players are awarded coins which are used to purchase buffs and pieces that allow them wrest control of the board AND the battlefield. Buffs are a powerful tool than can grant a piece a unique advantage on the board or in combat.



⠀⠀⠀

⠀

...and Conquer.

In combat, each piece has access to two unique attacks. Learning how pieces counter one another in combat is vital to exploiting your opponent's weaknesses. Damage pieces take in battle carries over afterward. So even if a battle seems hopeless, you can endeavor to weaken your opponent's piece.



⠀⠀⠀

Key Features:

  • Unique blend of turn-based tactics and real-time dueling action.
  • Engage in intense 1v1 battles against skilled opponents.
  • Harness strategic thinking and plan your moves carefully.
  • Enhance your pieces with Buffs
  • Stop foes in their tracks with traps and hazards
  • Hire new pieces to aid you in battle from a colorful cast of characters
  • Defeat the enemy Wyrm and climb the leaderboard in your conquest to be the True King of Wyrms

Prepare to unleash your tactical brilliance and combat prowess in Wyrmicide. Will you crush your foes, claim victory, and become the One True Wyrm King?

⠀⠀⠀

short_description: There may only be one true Wyrm King and you're tasked in ensuring his succession! Engage in an exciting blend of turn-based tactics and real time 1v1 duels as you Stab, Shoot, Magic and Fireball your way to Victory!
